block.p: ABBOTT LABORATORIES LTD., Abbott Park, Ill., the medical products company, acquired 2 million common shares of the I-Stat Corp., Princeton, N.J., in connection with long-term sales, marketing and research agreements. It paid $22.7 million for the stake, which is 11.5 percent of I-Stat.

CONSOLIDATED CAPITAL OF NORTH AMERICA, Denver, said it planned to acquire the closely held Toledo Pickling and Sales Inc. by assuming $19 million in Toledo Pickling's outstanding debt, expanding into the Midwest steel service center market.

KNOLL INC., East Greenville, Pa., a maker of office furnishings, plans to buy back up to 3 million shares, or 6.8 percent, of its common stock.
